roleset.name: to direct

example.name: guide through
example.text: In a joint-venture deal , Mitsui guided Candela through Tokyo 's bureaucratic maze .

example.name: guide in
example.text: Unfortunately , though , recessions vary enough in length so that [the average]-2 ca n't reliably be used *-2 [* to guide investors in timing stock sales or purchases .
example.arg: in timing stock sales or purchases

example.name: transitive
example.text: [Richard G. Sim , the man credited [*] with *-2]transforming Applied Power Inc. from an underachiever into a feisty player in the global market for hydraulic tools , hopes [*] to guide a similar turnaround at the company 's latest acquisition , Barry Wright Corp .
example.arg: *-2]transforming Applied Power Inc. from an underachiever into a feisty player in the global market for hydraulic tools ,
a similar turnaround at the company 's latest acquisition , Barry Wright Corp

example.name: with signpost, map
example.text: And they also had the lights of the city , the port wall lanterns , and a shore crane 's spotlight [0] * to guide on [*T*] .

example.name: with GOL
example.text: Several of us A2K'ers have created a support group [0]-3 [*-3]to painlessly guide you towards appearing knowledgeable even if , like many of us , you are clueless .
example.arg: towards appearing knowledgeable even if , like many of us , you are clueless

example.name: args 0 and 2
example.text: There was almost no guidance from the court on how to do it.

example.name: arg2
example.text: provided guidance on cleaning, disinfection, and other control measures to the nursery
example.arg: on cleaning, disinfection, and other control measures
